practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Worker's Compensation|Truck Accidents|Car Accidents|Medical Malpractice|Brain Injury|Birth Injury|Wrongful Death
description:
At Cain Law Office, we take our jobs as advocates for the injured seriously. To date, we have recovered more than $30 million for people in and around Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, who have experienced the unthinkable:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Nursing home abuse and medical malpractice
  • Defective products
  • Brain injuries

We also guide people through workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims. In short, our law office helps people secure money they need to recover and move forward with their lives. We work with subject matter experts to build the strongest possible case in order to maximize awards.

For our accomplishments, our team has earned a number of honors such as being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; being invited to join the Million Dollar Advocates Forum; and being listed in the Brain Injury Trial Lawyers: Top 25.

Our top priority is to make an otherwise devastating time in someone's life bearable. We are available on nights and weekends to answer our clients' concerns. Also, we work on a contingency basis, which means that if we do not win a case, we do not collect a fee. Our attorneys will even connect clients with medical providers when they have trouble finding one.

In addition to our extensive personal injury practice, Cain Law Office also handles bankruptcy and criminal defense cases.

Cain Law Office is a debt relief agency. We help people seek bankruptcy protection under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
